sql.where:
BoardNum > 0
AND BoardContents
AND BoardTitle
AND BoardWriter
LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QnA ( BoardNum, BoardWriter, CreateDate, BoardTitle, BoardContents, BoardCategory, UpdateDate, BoardHit, REF, STEP, DEPTH ) VALUES ( BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{boardWriter}, SYSDATE, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents}, 'Q', SYSDATE, 0, BOARD_SEQ.CURRVAL, 0, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE QnA SET STEP=STEP+1 WHERE REF=#{ref} AND STEP>#{step}
UPDATE QnA SET BoardTitle = #{boardTitle}, BoardContents=#{boardContents}, UpdateDate=SYSDATE WHERE BoardNum = #{boardNum}
mapper.delete: UPDATE QnA SET DEL=1 WHERE BoardNum = #{boardNum}
